text:
University of Minnesota
General Extension Division
Minneapolis 14
Radio Station KUOM
25 August 1952
770 ON YOUR DIAL
Mr. Gpaydon ^usmus
Radio Station WUOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
I hope that your trip home was a pleasant one and that you
are now back in the harness at WUOA.
This morning*s mail brought me the University of Alabama’s
Extension News Bulletin of April 1952 with its story of ’’Alabama
Document.” I was vaguely aware of this series, but this attractive
brochure re-impressed me and aroused my curiosity and interest.
Do you have a tape or two you could loan me so that I might take
a listen? If so, I am sure that there are several of my staff
members here who would like to listen to the Alabama opposite
number of the ”1ales of Minnesota" which we did here several years
ago.
With best personal regards.
Yours sincerely.
burton Paulu
Manager
BPscjm
